data.title: What would a NBA Draft of former Big Ten players look like?
data.meta_description: BTN.com's Sean Merriman gives a look at what a one-round draft of former Big Ten players in the NBA today would look like.
data.text:
With the 2016 NBA Draft set to get underway on Thursday, it?s time to have some drafting fun.

[ MORE: Big Ten players in NBA Mock Drafts ]

Several former Big Ten stars are expected to hear their name called in the upcoming draft, which got me thinking about this year?s Big Ten class, and how they fare compared to past Big Ten draft picks.

Imagine if every former Big Ten player in the NBA today was filtered into a one-round NBA Draft, which included this year's draft prospects. What would it look like?

I?m going to answer that for you. In order to do so, I?m going to use this year?s NBA Draft order. So, the Philadelphia 76ers will pick first, while the Golden State Warriors will pick 30th.

This list doesn?t necessarily reflect the order of the top Big Ten players in the NBA today, because you have to take age, injuries and numerous other factors into account. Think of it as if you were drafting a team to start your own NBA franchise right now.

With that said, here?s a look at what a one-round draft of former Big Ten players in the NBA today would look like. Remember, this year?s NBA draft prospects are included.

1. Philadelphia 76ers: PF Draymond Green

Big Ten School: Michigan State

Current NBA Team: Golden State Warriors

Drafted: 2012, Second Round, 35th overall

NBA Stats: 13.9 PPG, 9.5 RPG, 7.4 APG

2. Los Angeles Lakers: SG Victor Oladipo

Big Ten School: Indiana

Current NBA Team: Orlando Magic

Drafted: 2013, First Round, 2nd overall

NBA Stats: 16.0 PPG, 4.8 RPG, 3.9 APG

3. Boston Celtics: PF Zach Randolph

Big Ten School: Michigan State

Current NBA Team: Memphis Grizzlies

Drafted: 2001, First Round, 19th overall

NBA Stats: 15.3 PPG, 7.8 RPG, 2.1 APG

4. Phoenix Suns: PG Mike Conley Jr.

Big Ten School: Ohio State

Current NBA Team: Memphis Grizzlies

Drafted: 2007, First Round, 4th overall

NBA Stats: 15.3 PPG, 6.1 APG, 2.9 RPG

5. Minnesota Timberwolves: SG Gary Harris

Big Ten School: Michigan State

Current NBA Team: Denver Nuggets

Drafted: 2014, First Round, 19th overall

NBA Stats: 12.3 PPG, 2.9RPG, 1.9 APG

6. New Orleans Pelicans: PG D'Angelo Russell

Big Ten School: Ohio State

Current NBA Team: Los Angeles Lakers

Drafted: 2015, First Round, 2nd overall

NBA Stats: 13.2 PPG, 3.4 RPG, 3.3 APG

7. Denver Nuggets: SG Jamal Crawford

Big Ten School: Michigan

Current NBA Team: Los Angeles Clippers

8. Sacramento Kings: PF Jared Sullinger

Current NBA Team: Boston Celtics

Drafted: 2012, First Round, 21st overall

9. Toronto Raptors: SG Eric Gordon
